Analyte(s): cfb gene sequence specific to Streptococcus agalactiae genome
Specimen Type(s): Vaginal/rectal specimen swabs (after 18-24 hour LIM broth enrichment)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GenePOC GBS LB assay using real-time PCR on the revogene platform for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus DNA from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test to detect Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA from 18-24 hour LIM broth enrichments of vaginal/rectal specimen swabs from pregnant women to identify antepartum GBS colonization; not intended for susceptibility testing or infection diagnosis/monitoring.
